alienate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to do something that makes someone unfriendly or unwilling to support you
alienate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The latest tax proposals will alienate many voters.
alienate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to make it difficult for someone to belong to a particular group or to feel comfortable with a particular person
alienate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He felt that his experiences had alienated him from society.
